sources.title: Miraculous Journey
sources.description: Title: Miraculous Journey Summary: How a plane crash in the jungle affects the survivors after they are rescued. Directed by: Sam Newfield Actors: Rory Calhoun, Audrey Long, Virginia Grey Production Company: Sigmund Neufeld Productions Release Date: 5 May 1950 (Australia) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The passengers and crew of an airplane are stranded in a jungle area unknown to them. The plot deals with a criminal on board who caused the crash and how he tries to take over the destiny of all the passengers. We do not see them after an escape is finally achieved: This whole plot is about the people on this plane and how they re=act with the situation and with each other.
